channel.title: rice on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in rice on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Baked Rice Pudding
item.description: Ingredients: 250g pudding (short grain) rice 1200ml milk 70g caster sugar 1 teaspoon vanilla extract Pinch of Cinammon 4 tablespoons brown sugar Whipped cream to serve Method: Preheat oven to 150 degrees C Place the pudding rice in a ceramic dish In a saucepan, place the milk, caster sugar and vanilla extract. Bring to the boil. Pour the boiling liquid over the rice and cover the ceramic dish with tin foil.

item.title: One Pot Chicken Chow Mein
item.description: An easy, one pot Chicken Chow Mein loaded with vegetables and ready in 30 minutes! Servings 6 Calories 392kcal Ingredients 1 tablespoon canola oil 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed 1 red pepper diced 1 cup stringless snap peas 3 cups shredded cabbage or coleslaw mix 2 large carrot peeled and shredded 1 teaspoon minced garlic 1/2 teaspoon minced ginger 1-2 pinches red pepper flakes 4 cups chicken broth 1/2 cup soy sauce 1/4 cup hoisin sauce 375 g box whole grain spaghettini pasta 2 tablespoons water 1 tablespoon cornflour Method

item.title: Savoury Rice
item.description: Ingredients 1 onion 3 mushrooms 1/2 red pepper 1 tomato 1 x 10ml spoon oil 150g long grain rice 1 x 5ml spoon vegetable stock powder or cube 550ml boiling water 50g peas 1 x 10ml spoon curry powder Method Prepare the vegetables: Peel and chop the onion Slice the mushrooms Deseed and dice the red pepper Chop the tomato Fry the onion in oil until soft.

item.title: Baked Mushroom Rice - Nigel Slater (4 people)
item.description: INGREDIENTS 200g Shallots 4 cloves Garlic 150g Arborio Rice Sprigs of Thyme 1 litre Chicken or Vegetable Stock Grated Parmesan Salt & Pepper METHODTIPSTWIST

item.title: Authentic Spanish Paella with Prawns Chicken Rabbit and Snails
item.description: Serves 2 Source of Recipe Paul Merrett Preparation Time 30 mins to 1 hr Cooking Time 10 to 30 mins Ingredients 15ml/1tbsp extra virgin olive oil 2 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced thinly 1 saddle of rabbit, cut into even sized pieces 1 chicken breast, cut into large chunks 3 raw king prawns, shell on 10-15 live mussels, washed and debearded 4 ripe vine tomatoes, chopped finely 200g/7oz Spanish paella rice large pinch of saffron 1L/1Â¾pt hot chicken stock 200g/7oz cannellini beans 10 canned snails 50g/2oz frozen broad beans 50g/2oz frozen peas paprika to taste 10 cherry tomatoes salt and pepper Method

item.title: Rice Cooking Times
item.description: Rice Water 75g 200ml 150g 400ml 188g 500ml 11 Minutes full power allow to stand for 2 minutes
